solution_line_template: If Reeta has {reeta_pencils} pencils, then twice that number is {multiplier_twice}*{reeta_pencils} = {twice_reeta_pencils} pencils.
Anika has {anika_more_than_twice} more than twice the number of pencils as Reeta, which means she has {twice_reeta_pencils}+{anika_more_than_twice} = {anika_pencils} pencils.
